item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 3, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (240 points | 147 comments)
2. Were RNNs All We Needed? (85 points | 22 comments)
3. Starlink offering free internet access for 30 days for Hurricane Helene victims (88 points | 44 comments)
4. Serving 70B-Scale LLMs Efficiently on Low-Resource Edge Devices [pdf] (144 points | 46 comments)
5. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (134 points | 73 comments)
6. Improving Accessibility Using Vision Models (7 points | discuss)
7. Image Editing with Gaussian Splatting (186 points | 46 comments)
8. Solving methane mysteries with satellite imagery (94 points | 15 comments)
9. FLUX1.1 [pro] – New SotA text-to-image model from Black Forest Labs (113 points | 60 comments)
10. Activeloop (YC S18) hiring an AI search engineer to ship fast, accurate search ( | hide)
11. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (519 points | 162 comments)
12. Why Gumroad Didn't Choose Htmx (24 points | 1 comment)
13. William Cowper and the Age of the Earth [pdf] (2019) (14 points | 7 comments)
14. Identification of officer from Sir John franklin's Northwest Passage expedition (6 points | discuss)
15. I Solve Problems (talk at EuroBSDCon 2024) (6 points | 1 comment)
16. Earth's ambipolar electrostatic field and its role in ion escape to space (5 points | discuss)
17. UK will give sovereignty of Chagos Islands to Mauritius (45 points | 49 comments)
18. What Kind of Writer Is ChatGPT? (10 points | 8 comments)
19. Discussing the Neptunian desert, savanna, and ridge (5 points | discuss)
20. Determinism in League of Legends: Implementation (2017) (73 points | 32 comments)
21. The latter half of October, the maintainer goes offline (29 points | 9 comments)
22. Modifications to GPU Hardware to Benefit Signed Distance Fields (42 points | 9 comments)
23. Alert Evaluations: Incremental Merges in ClickHouse (24 points | 6 comments)
24. Two AI review your favourite movie scripts (NotebookLM) (13 points | 7 comments)
25. France's oldest treasure hunt has been solved (149 points | 30 comments)
26. Gamma radiation is produced in large tropical thunderstorms (133 points | 91 comments)
27. Ever: Exact Volumetric Ellipsoid Rendering for Real-Time View Synthesis (62 points | 12 comments)
28. Terminal colours are tricky (277 points | 115 comments)
29. The forgotten story of Britain’s perilous bid to fly around the world (9 points | 2 comments)
30. NSO Should Lose Spyware Case for Discovery Violations, Meta Says (45 points | 17 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 3, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
